description.@en: You speak aloud your unswerving loyalty to the Winter King, bequeathing all with a gift of unmitigated fury.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of allies equal to your [FB]. All allies may spend 1 AP to make two Attack Actions or two Perilous Stunts on their Turn, despite the normal limitations presented in Combat.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but those so affected gain 2 APs instead.

criticalFailure.@en: You have trespassed upon the threshold of your god and must pay the price. The Winter King demands that you sacrifice a part of yourself, as you suffer a Grievous Injury, Serious Injury and Moderate Injury.

reagents.@en: The tail of a wolf, incinerated (expended)
